attributes.action: put presure on world leaders to stop or slower green house gasses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ice in the Artic is melting faster than ever. 

Water levels will raise by 1 meter flooding many homes around the world.

If we don't do anything now, it will be too late to act another time.

The world Isn't going to change for the better by its self. It needs the world leaders help to change things now!

If you see this petition, please email it too all your friends and family across the globe.

Thanks
